introduction: 欢迎你和“桑尼-帕克”一起参加“邪恶新浪系列特别集”，成为塞隆和纳姆努埃的婚礼见证人。You are welcome to be a wedding witness of Sailom and Namnuea on "Wedding Plan the Series Special Episode" with “Sunny-Pak”.
